titles.title: The life of Jesus Christ in you will rise again

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The life of Jesus Christ in you will rise again,
The life of Jesus Christ in me will rise again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though floods may seem to drown it,
And the fires of hell surround it,
Though it may seem buried in a tomb,
It can't stay down.

verse.name: v3
